articles.author: David Chau
articles.title: ASX to rise, Wall Street snaps three-day losing streak - ABC News
articles.description: Australian shares are set to lift after US markets recovered from a three-day losing streak — sparked by signs of economic slowdown in China, Europe's energy crisis and concerns the US Federal Reserve may continue to hike interest rates aggressively.
articles.content: Australian shares have risen as US markets recovered from a three-day losing streak  sparked by signs of economic slowdown in China, Europe's energy crisis and concerns the US Federal Reserve may con… [+3763 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: US President Joe Biden announces nearly $US3 billion in new military aid for Ukraine - ABC News
articles.description: As the war in Ukraine drags on, US security assistance is shifting to a longer-term campaign that also will likely keep more American military troops in Europe into the future, US officials said.
articles.content: Six months after Russia's invasion of Ukraine, United States President Joe Biden announced that he is sending $US2.98 billion ($4.33 billion) in new military aid to Ukraine that will enable forces th… [+7094 chars]
